contents.text: Welcome to SpotX, New York’s trusted platform powering programmatic video for premium publishers and broadcasters.
For new business partnerships and demos, press '1'.
Thank you for your interest. Please hold while we connect you with our Sales team.

navigationGoals: Schedule a demo for SpotX’s programmatic video solution
I run a veteran nonprofit and would like a demo of your programmatic video ad solutions to explore a new partnership.
I’d like to schedule a demo of SpotX’s programmatic video API integration.
I’d like a simple demonstration of your video platform and to discuss starting a new partnership.
Schedule a demo of SpotX’s programmatic video platform for my university physics outreach project

contents.text: If you are an existing partner, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you with your Partner Success Manager.

navigationGoals: Review my current campaign performance with the Partner Success Manager
As an existing partner focused on veteran content, I need help optimizing our ad placements for better performance.
I’m an existing partner and need to discuss optimizing our ad yield with my Partner Success Manager.
I’m an existing partner and need to speak with my Partner Success Manager about some questions.
Review my existing partnership performance metrics and discuss optimization for my educational channel

contents.text: For technical support and platform assistance, press '1'.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you to Technical Support.

navigationGoals: Resolve an ad tag integration issue on the SpotX platform
I’m integrating your SDK into my veteran storytelling app and need assistance troubleshooting a playback error.
I’m encountering an API authentication error in my SpotX integration and need technical assistance.
I need technical help using the platform—I’m having trouble uploading videos.
Troubleshoot an API integration error I’m encountering while uploading lecture recordings

contents.text: For billing inquiries and account questions, press '2'.
One moment please. We’ll connect you with our Billing department.

navigationGoals: Clarify a recent billing charge and request my invoice
I want to review and dispute an unexpected charge on my account related to my billing statement.
I have questions about my latest invoice charges and want to update my payment method.
I have a billing question about an invoice I received.
Clarify the charges on my latest SpotX invoice and inquire about student billing options
